alert.note: Alert for De Kalb (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:01PM EDT until July 26 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern De Kalb County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Defiance County in northwestern Ohio... Southern Williams County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1000 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hamilton to near Butler to near St. Joe, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Defiance, Bryan, Butler, Edgerton, Stryker, Edgerton In Williams County, Farmer, Newville, Ney, Blakeslee, Evansport, Williams Center, Melbern, The Bend, Artic, and Brunersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
